description: Place n distinguishable balls in n boxes (in n^n ways); let f(n,k) = number of ways that max in any box is k, for 1<=k<=n; sequence gives f(n,n-2)/n.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 3..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (5,-10,10,-5,1).
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[-(9 x^6 - 35 x^5 + 41 x^4 + 5 x^3 - 45 x^2 + 35 x + 2)/(x - 1)^5, {x, 0, 50}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Oct 16 2013 *)
author: Lee Corbin (lcorbin(AT)tsoft.com), _N. J. A. Sloane_.
